review:
Friendly doctor. Explains everything with all details and provide enough details on what to do.
I consulted for Dengue fever.

tags: None
review:
Sheryl is truly a gem, friendly nature, careful listener.
Educated calmly about the possibilities and their treatment considering the situation across the city.
******* ** *** ** *** ***** ************* *** ***** ***********I had a very unique experience visiting her.

tags: None
review:
Doctor is very ************* *** friendly. Helped my mother in curing the swollen foot.
No medicine but movement of leg using physiotherapy suggested by her worked wonders.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Sheela was one of the most compassionate and friendly doctor you can ever meet. She explained in crystal clear way why the issue happened to me, and how it can be cured. She didn't advised any other tests and also prevented from taking some medicines unless necessarily required. Also, she took extra time and advised me of different problem i had. Rare to see such doctors nowadays, who would take time out her billable time just for patient's sake.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sheela Abraham with her vast experience is a go to person for any general ailment. she would get into the root of the issue and would explain the cause and treatment methodology. she is a person who do not believe in too much of tests and stuff. Only if it required she would recommend for any specific test. I would definitely recommend her to everyone in my friend and family circle.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Sheela is a gem and rarest to find such ethical professionals in today's world where everyone is running behind money. 
1. She has strong empathy with patients
2. She is very careful and has attention to details. She checks are the historical reports meticulously and prescribes minimum required tests and medicines
3. She patiently listens to the problem and spends good amount of time before taking decision
4. Thinks more from patient perspective and investigates the issue at root level
It is hard to find intelligent and ethical doctors like Dr. Sheela.

tags: None
review: The one time visit helped me to solve most of my cough related issues and breathing problems ...........

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She explained all the details in length and what will be next steps in case the problem resurfaces.The doctor is friendly and listens and gives proper time to patient.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was suffering from backache and other issues for which I consulted Dr. Sheela. She had explained very well about the cause of the problem , do's and don'ts and suggested some food practices that I need to follow.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ****** ** **** ****. Listens to problems and prescribes good medicine as well. Never gives unnecessary or costly medicines. Always satisfied with medication.
